UI_visible_response: Read 32 web pagesView Page Details“China’s Wailing Wall” refers to the Weibo page of Dr. Li Wenliang, an ophthalmologist at Wuhan Central Hospital who was one of the first to warn about the COVID-19 outbreak. After he contracted the virus and passed away on February 7, 2020, his Weibo page became a place where hundreds of thousands of Chinese netizens expressed their grief, shared their thoughts, and called for justice. This page was likened to the Wailing Wall in Jerusalem, a place of mourning and prayer, and thus earned the name “China’s Wailing Wall”.CopyTry AgainShare
traffic_visible_response: “China’s Wailing Wall” refers to the Weibo page of Dr. Li Wenliang, an ophthalmologist at Wuhan Central Hospital who was one of the first to warn about the COVID-19 outbreak[^1^]. After he contracted the virus and passed away on February 7, 2020, his Weibo page became a place where hundreds of thousands of Chinese netizens expressed their grief, shared their thoughts, and called for justice[^1^]. This page was likened to the Wailing Wall in Jerusalem, a place of mourning and prayer, and thus earned the name “China’s Wailing Wall”[^1^].
